result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: You could of course claim that...
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh go
result.orig: Thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh go
result.html: Thiocfadh leat a mhaíomh ar ndóigh goYou could of course claim that...
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ṁaíoṁ ar ndóiġ goYou could of course claim that...

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.html: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaitheOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
